payload.description: Racecar: a simple framework for Kafka consumers in Ruby
Racecar: a simple framework for Kafka consumers in Ruby

issue.title: ActiveSupport::Logger.broadcast dropped in Rails 7.1
issue.body:
After upgrading to Rails 7.1, starting a consumers fails with the following:

```
=> Detected Rails, booting application...
=> Crashed: NoMethodError: undefined method `broadcast' for ActiveSupport::Logger:Class
[...]racecar-2.9.0/lib/racecar/rails_config_file_loader.rb:30:in `load!'
```

Is a fix in the pipeline? If not I'll make a PR shortly.

pull_request.title: Resolve Rails 7.1 logger incompatibility
pull_request.body:
Resolves https://github.com/zendesk/racecar/issues/356

There don't appear to be any tests which cover this but I've verified that it works locally.

issue.title: ActiveSupport::Logger.broadcast dropped in Rails 7.1
issue.body:
After upgrading to Rails 7.1, starting a consumers fails with the following:

```
=> Detected Rails, booting application...
=> Crashed: NoMethodError: undefined method `broadcast' for ActiveSupport::Logger:Class
[...]racecar-2.9.0/lib/racecar/rails_config_file_loader.rb:30:in `load!'
```

Is a fix in the pipeline? If not I'll make a PR shortly.

comment.body: I'm curious as to why this PR was closed ( I would have liked that fix :grin:  )
